# Darwin UI

> Darwin UI is a macOS-inspired React component library featuring glass-morphism aesthetics, dark theme, and Tailwind CSS integration. It provides 30+ production-ready components with Framer Motion animations and full accessibility support.

## Overview

Darwin UI brings the refined aesthetics of macOS to React applications. Key features include:

- **macOS-inspired design**: Glass-morphism effects, traffic light buttons, window chrome
- **Dark theme by default**: Optimized for dark mode with carefully chosen color palettes
- **Framer Motion animations**: Smooth spring physics and micro-interactions
- **Tailwind CSS**: Full integration with Tailwind for easy customization
- **Accessible**: WAI-ARIA compliant with keyboard navigation support
- **TypeScript**: Full type definitions included

### Installation

```bash
npm install @pikoloo/darwin-ui
```

Import the styles in your app entry point:

```javascript
import '@pikoloo/darwin-ui/styles.css';
```

## Components

- [Accordion](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#accordion): Collapsible content sections
- [Avatar](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#avatar): User avatar with fallback and group support
- [Badge](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#badge): Status badges with semantic colors
- [Button](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#button): Versatile button with 10 variants and 3 sizes
- [Card](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#card): Container component with header, content, and footer sections
- [Charts](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#charts): Line, Bar, Area, Pie, Donut, and Stacked Bar charts
- [Checkbox](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#checkbox): Checkbox with indeterminate state and spring animations
- [CloseButton](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#close-button): Red close button matching macOS style
- [ContactForm](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#contact-form): Pre-built contact form component
- [ContextMenu](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#context-menu): Right-click context menu
- [DateSelect](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#date-select): Date picker with calendar interface
- [Dialog](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#dialog): Modal dialog with focus trap and portal rendering
- [DropdownMenu](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#dropdown-menu): Full-featured dropdown menu with keyboard navigation
- [Image](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#image): Image component with click-to-enlarge
- [Input](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#input): Text input with validation states
- [MdEditor](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#md-editor): Markdown editor with preview
- [Modal](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#modal): Modal dialog with backdrop
- [MultiSelect](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#multi-select): Multi-selection dropdown with tags
- [Popover](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#popover): Flexible popover component with portal support
- [Progress](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#progress): Linear and circular progress indicators
- [Reveal](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#reveal): Scroll-triggered reveal animations
- [SearchInput](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#search-input): Search input with icon
- [Select](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#select): Dropdown select with custom styling
- [Sidebar](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#sidebar): Navigation sidebar with active state
- [Skeleton](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#skeleton): Loading placeholder with shimmer effect
- [Slider](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#slider): Range slider with customizable track and thumb
- [Switch](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#switch): Toggle switch component with spring physics
- [Table](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#table): Data table with sorting and loading states
- [Tabs](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#tabs): Tabbed navigation component
- [Textarea](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#textarea): Multi-line text input with auto-resize
- [Tooltip](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#tooltip): Accessible tooltip with multiple positions
- [Upload](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#upload): File upload with drag-and-drop support
- [Window](https://darwin-ui.pikoloo.com/docs#window): macOS-style window chrome with traffic lights

## Hooks

- **useMediaQuery**: Responsive design hook for media queries
- **useIsMobile**: Hook to detect mobile viewport (< 768px)
- **useEscapeKey**: Hook for modal dismissal on Escape key
- **useContactForm**: Form handling hook with validation
